control.name: accordionControl
control.description: Editors for this region are generated automatically in accordance with public properties within the 'FilteringModel' filtering Model. The simplest editors (e.g., the editors for the 'InStock' and 'Category' properties) work out-of-the-box. Numeric editors (the 'Price' property) receive their minimum and maximum values in the QueryRangeData event handler. The QueryLookupData event allows you to populate complex lookup editors (the 'Trademark' property).
